pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.2: the nuns gave the full ordination to a woman who was breastfeeding.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.5: “Give almsfood to the nun. She has a companion.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.7: “How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.8: The nuns heard the complaints of those people
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.9: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.10: “How can nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.11: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.14: “… How can the nuns give the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.15: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.16: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:1.17: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.6: she is a mother or a wet-nurse.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.9: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.10: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.11: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.12: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.13: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.14: If she is breastfeeding, and she perceives her as breastfeeding, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.15: If she is breastfeeding, but she is unsure if she is, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.16: If she is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as breastfeeding, and she gives her the full ordination, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.17: If she is not breastfeeding, but she perceives her as breastfeeding, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.18: If she is not breastfeeding, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.19: If she is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as breastfeeding, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.21: if she gives the full ordination to a woman who is breastfeeding, but she does not perceive her as breastfeeding;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.22: if she gives the full ordination to a woman who is not breastfeeding, and she does not perceive her as breastfeeding;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.24: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc62:2.25: The second training rule is finished.
